page.title: .Change_End()

case.description: TRUE (.T.) = the proposed field changes in the record buffer are written to the file.
FALSE (.F.) = flag value aborts the field changes without changing the record.

page.discussion: The .Change_End() method indicates that you are finished changing the value of one or more field rules and want to save the changes. Use .RULES_GET() to create the pointer. Limitations, Desktop applications only.
page.example: dim tbl as P dim fr as P tbl = table.open("invoice_header") fr = tbl.rules_get() fr.change_begin() fr.date.skip = "F" fr.change_end(.t.) tbl.close()
